description: {"blocks":[{"key":"e2ccj","text":"Protocol for isolation of peripheral blood mononuclear cells for downstream applications requiring viable cells or cell pellets to extract DNA or RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"4cnrr","text":"Notes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7omcc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2efs4","text":"From Thermofisher (Answer Id: E4470): \"Blood collected with EDTA typically has the highest DNA contamination, blood collected with heparin typically has less than that collected with EDTA, and blood collected with citrate shows the least DNA contamination of the three. (Formulation for citrate solution: 3.8% (w/v) which is 3.8 g/100 mL of water. Use 0.5 mL for every 4.5 mL of blood. Rock gently back and forth after adding citrate solution to mix.) Adding 12 µL of 5 N acetic acid per milliliter of TRIzol Reagent may help, although there may still be a problem with DNA contamination. Using plasma or serum works best. The fresher the blood sample the better the RNA. Degraded RNA has been observed in blood that has been processed in as little as two hours after drawing.\"","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":38,"length":738}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjmqr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mr5b","text":"Reagent manuals:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cl7fp","text":"Ficoll-Paque Plus: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hlvoGTZ60NTTsKaTwFiznoF1eh4vufwm/","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":66}],"data":{}},{"key":"ak219","text":"Histopaque 1077: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1jgZXuhhGaw0cCRLKa9K_1W2KaOLgPhHq/","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":17,"length":66}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2CB01336D06711EC97200A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hlvoGTZ60NTTsKaTwFiznoF1eh4vufwm"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"201F3115D15011ECA5680A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1jgZXuhhGaw0cCRLKa9K_1W2KaOLgPhHq"}}}}
